TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ContentRight extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies rights that can be granted to users for accessing content in a rights managed document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks All rights allow users to decrypt protected content. In addition, the enumeration values that follow grant specific additional rights.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight DocumentEdit = int32(11)

Docs.summary: The user can edit the document that contains the protected content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight Edit = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The user can edit and encrypt the protected content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight Export = int32(12)

Docs.summary: The user can export the protected content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight Extract = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The user can extract (copy and paste) the protected content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight Forward = int32(7)

Docs.summary: The user can forward the protected content to another user.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight ObjectModel = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The user can control programmed access to the protected content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight Owner = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The user is the content owner. The owner can edit and encrypt the protected content, and decrypt the signed .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight Print = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The user can print the protected content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight Reply = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The user can reply to the sender of the protected content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight ReplyAll = int32(9)

Docs.summary: The user can "reply all" to recipients of the protected content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight Sign = int32(10)

Docs.summary: The user can digitally sign the protected content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight View = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The user can view the protected content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight ViewRightsData = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The user can decrypt and view the rights specified in the signed .
